```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
if (requireNamespace("tracetheme", quietly = TRUE)) {
  knitr::opts_chunk$set(
    fig.height = tracetheme::vignette_dim$vig_height,
    fig.width = tracetheme::vignette_dim$vig_width
  )
  ggplot2::theme_set(tracetheme::theme_trace())
}
```
